name: d3-hierarchy
description: Layout algorithms for visualizing hierarchical data.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-hierarchy.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-hierarchy.js -c -m -o build/d3-hierarchy.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-hierarchy/build/d3-hierarchy.js d3-hierarchy.v1.js && cp ../d3-hierarchy/build/d3-hierarchy.min.js d3-hierarchy.v1.min.js && git add d3-hierarchy.v1.js d3-hierarchy.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-hierarchy ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-hierarchy.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-hierarchy.js build/d3-hierarchy.min.js
